article_title: Child Protective Services' Julie Ahnen: Co-sleeping not a reason why children removed from home
article_text:
Madison, WI (53711)

Today

Partly cloudy.

Tonight

Mostly cloudy skies this evening will become partly cloudy after midnight. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. Low near 60F. Winds light and variable.

article_metadata.description: Dear Editor: I am writing in response to the column by Ingrid Andersson and others, “Dangerous gaps in county’s safe sleep campaign.” As the manager of Child Protective Services for
